Uses of Package
io.vertx.reactivex.core.eventbus

  • Packages that use io.vertx.reactivex.core.eventbus 
    Package Description
    io.vertx.reactivex.core  
    io.vertx.reactivex.core.eventbus  
    io.vertx.reactivex.ext.unit.collect  
    io.vertx.reactivex.servicediscovery.types  
  • Classes in io.vertx.reactivex.core.eventbus used by io.vertx.reactivex.core 
    Class and Description
    EventBus
    A Vert.x event-bus is a light-weight distributed messaging system which allows different parts of your application, or different applications and services to communicate with each in a loosely coupled way.
  • Classes in io.vertx.reactivex.core.eventbus used by io.vertx.reactivex.core.eventbus 
    Class and Description
    DeliveryContext
    Encapsulates a message being delivered by Vert.x as well as providing control over the message delivery.
    EventBus
    A Vert.x event-bus is a light-weight distributed messaging system which allows different parts of your application, or different applications and services to communicate with each in a loosely coupled way.
    Message
    Represents a message that is received from the event bus in a handler.
    MessageConsumer
    An event bus consumer object representing a stream of message to an EventBus address that can be read from.
    MessageProducer
    Represents a stream of message that can be written to.
  • Classes in io.vertx.reactivex.core.eventbus used by io.vertx.reactivex.ext.unit.collect 
    Class and Description
    MessageConsumer
    An event bus consumer object representing a stream of message to an EventBus address that can be read from.
  • Classes in io.vertx.reactivex.core.eventbus used by io.vertx.reactivex.servicediscovery.types 
    Class and Description
    MessageConsumer
    An event bus consumer object representing a stream of message to an EventBus address that can be read from.
